name: Update Stat
author: Валерий Заочный

sections.description: Update Stat displays the daily statistics updates of Russian and Ukrainian search systems Google and Yandex and indicators CY and PR.
sections.installation:
To use Update Stat, you will need:

  • an installed and configured copy of WordPress version 3.4.x

  • FTP or SFTP access to your web host

New Installations

  1. Download the Update Stat archive in zip or gzipped tar format and
    extract the files on your computer.

  2. Create a new directory named update-stat in the wp-content/plugins
    directory of your WordPress installation. Use an FTP or SFTP client to
    upload the contents of your Update Stat archive to the new directory
    that you just created on your web host.

  3. Log in to the WordPress Dashboard and activate the Update Stat plugin.

  4. Configure the plugin and add it to the plugin settings page.
sections.faq:
Q: What settings provides a plug-in?
R: You can specify the number of days for which the display statistics.
sections.changelog:
1.0

Plugin release. Operate all the basic functions.

1.1

Fixed bugs with CSS.

1.2

Fixed saving settings.
Added display indicators CY and PR.
Improved caching of css and javascript files.
